education.qualification: BSc Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence
details: Key modules: Data Structures & Algorithms, Embedded Systems Programming, Software Engineering, Operating Systems, Networks

Managed deployment, version control (Git), and incremental updates, achieving downtime of <1%.
Managed bookings, reservations, and customer interactions efficiently, improving customer satisfaction by 20%.
Assisted in POS operations and reporting tasks, reducing errors by 15%.
